title: Mark Systems Rapidly Expands Consulting Staff
text: Mark Systems Rapidly Expands Consulting Staff After record breaking sales in the second and third quarters of 2015, Mark Systems rapidly expanded consulting, sales, and support staff to fuel demand of their software and consulting services. I know how to tie IHMS in with processes to increase efficiency and am looking forward to bringing my experience to other IHMS users; seeing how builders operate in different markets MT HOLLY, NJ, September 23,   Mark Systems, the residential construction industry's leading provider of single-database ERP home builder software, is pleased to announce the addition of Chris Mierchuk to the Consulting team. After record breaking sales in the second and third quarters of 2015, Mark Systems rapidly expanded consulting, sales, and support staff to fuel demand of their software and consulting services. Chris Mierchuk, the newest Business Consultant at Mark Systems , has over 10 years of experience in the residential construction industry; holding positions of Purchasing Manager, Operations Specialist, and IT Manager. Appointed as Project Manager, he led separate implementations of Mark Systems IHMS (Integrated Homebuilder Management System) for two Virginia home builders and has since become an IHMS expert. As a customer, Mark Systems Sales and Consulting teams regularly called on Mierchuk for recommendations, referrals, and IHMS product beta testing. " I have had a really good relationship with Mark Systems for many years and I wanted to help more than one builder; really expand my reach and work with builders on their processes related to software, specifically ," said Mierchuk, " I know how to tie IHMS in with processes to increase efficiency and maximize staff. I am looking forward to bringing my experience to other IHMS users, and seeing how other builders operate in different markets ." " Chris has done a fantastic job using IHMS as a tool to better home building organizations that he worked for over the last decade ," Robert Cain, Vice President of Consulting Services said. " Using the integration of IHMS, he has helped departments work together to become more efficient. Every company needs more internal training and we are excited to have Chris working with our customers to provide that training backed up with experience from the builder's world ." About Mark Systems Mark Systems' Integrated Homebuilder Management System (IHMS) is the industry's only single-database, enterprise wide home builder software suite. No other home builder software offers the power, flexibility, ease of use, and return on investment like IHMS. The premier residential construction accounting software on the market today, IHMS combines a proven track record of performance with cutting edge technology to provide the financial control today's tough business climate demands. Offering support for every home building activity, IHMS delivers full back-office and field operations functions directly to the desktop of every person in the building process. Mark Systems' single-database architecture means that residential construction information is delivered instantly and transparently to every team member. Purchasing , scheduling , field operations , trade partners , sales office , and design center personnel all effortlessly share critical information. For more information contact Kayla Ware at 609.702.9901 x124, email us at Info@MarkSystemsUSA.com , or visit us online at MarkSystemsUSA.com . # # #
